keyMoments.title: Chopper Reclaimed
keyMoments.description: After Luffy wins the roller race, Chopper is officially reclaimed and returns to the Straw Hat Pirates.
keyMoments.significance: Reunites the crew after Chopper's temporary loss to the Foxy Pirates.

keyMoments.title: Accept Rematch Challenge
keyMoments.description: The Straw Hat Pirates accept Foxy's challenge for a three-coin Davy Back Fight rematch.
keyMoments.significance: Puts the crew at risk again due to Luffy's impulsive decision-making.

keyMoments.title: Compete in Hit & Dead Ball
keyMoments.description: The Straw Hats participate in the pirate dodgeball game, facing multiple disqualifications due to rule violations.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the crew's struggle with the Foxy Pirates' rule-manipulation tactics.

keyMoments.title: Lose First Round
keyMoments.description: The Straw Hat Pirates lose the Hit & Dead Ball game to the Foxy Pirates.
keyMoments.significance: Puts the crew at a disadvantage in the three-coin match and shows the consequences of not understanding the complex rules.

keyMoments.title: Foxy Demands Rematch
keyMoments.description: Foxy, representing his crew's competitive spirit, demands a three-coin rematch of the Davy Back Fight.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the crew's refusal to accept defeat and their commitment to the Davy Back Fight tradition.

keyMoments.title: Rokuroshi Debuts as Referee
keyMoments.description: The crew's head referee Rokuroshi is introduced to oversee the Hit & Dead Ball game.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals another crew member with a specialized role in managing Davy Back Fight competitions.

keyMoments.title: Gina Debuts
keyMoments.description: Gina, the crew's shipwright, makes her first appearance during the dodgeball game.
keyMoments.significance: Expands the known membership of the Foxy Pirates and shows their crew composition.

keyMoments.title: Execute Ball Shuffling Tactic
keyMoments.description: The crew employs their signature cheating tactic of shuffling fake balls with the real one.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the Foxy Pirates' philosophy of exploiting rule loopholes to win.

keyMoments.title: Win Hit & Dead Ball
keyMoments.description: The Foxy Pirates win the first round of the rematch through strategic rule manipulation.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes their early lead in the three-coin match and validates their tactical approach.
